game.name: Klondike solitaire
game.description: Classic klondike solitaire game, playable in desktop, tablet or pc, totally free Flip cards from the Pile to the Preview. You can flip cards from the pile to the preview by clicking the Pile. You can flip either one card or three card per click depending on if you play draw 1 or draw 3.
